skills.name: Vitality Restoration
skills.description:
Buffs the target ally in the next healing, restoring HP by 35% of Gavial's ATK (by 70% of Gavial's ATK when the target's HP is lower than 50%) per second, lasting 5 seconds
Can store 2 charge(s)

skills.name: Vitality Restoration - Wide Range
skills.description: Buffs all allies within range immediately, restoring HP by 30% of Gavial's ATK (by 80% of Gavial's ATK when the target's HP is lower than 50%) per second, lasting 10 seconds

talents.name: Battlefield Medic
talents.description: After deployed, all [Medic] Operators' ATK +12% <@ba.talpu>(+2%)</> and DEF +120 <@ba.talpu>(+20)</>, lasting 17 <@ba.talpu>(+2)</> seconds
